Name: moniyash01
Title: A mind blowing experience
Review: What a experience it was in the Mystery rooms the challenges , tasks , surprises and the MYSTERIES we faced were awesome. I went for the 2nd time me and my friends enjoyed the experience 2 times and we are very lucky that we got to know about this place and visited there and enjoyed the experience. It's also a exercise or a test of your brain how could you face the challenges and solve them leniently . It was very good and the team was also very friendly to us .

Name: nitinks1987
Title: No one can escape without all hints.
Review: No one will be able to escape without hints.. All clues are very tough to understand.Without hint no one can escape in 60 mins

Name: Kavyaaaaaaaa
Title: A Night in Bhangarh - Really fun, interesting and spooky
Review: This mystery room was quite well made and the mystery was very interesting to solve. Definitely recommend it to anyone looking for an adventurous fun, spooky time with friends.

Name: 516manav
Title: Mystery Room Review
Review: I loved my day at Mystery room with my friends. Although a tad bit pricy especially for 3 to 4 people, I really liked the real life experience game I played there and would love to spend some time again.

Name: RishadMurtaza
Title: Mystery Rooms....  Adventure worth imbibing
Review: Mystery Rooms. It's an adventure worth imbibing. You may visit them with family or friends at any time of the day or year. Even if you had been an ardent fan of Sherlock Holmes you would still need all your intellect and imagination to succeed in the journey.  There are clues concealed with supreme acumen and hints drop by.  A knowledge of law and love for books would come handy.  So pull up your skills and take the challenge.  The more people are in the group the more one would enjoy. So all the best and have an enjoyable and mesmerizing experience

Name: Amogh_Shukla
Title: The experience was good
Review: Our experience was good ..But i have a complaint which has to be worked onIn the first escape room in bhangargarh theme theres an opening at the back of the room so one of my cousin tried to see whats inside that  as he touched the curtains he thought something is inside some kind of wall .. as he touched the curtain he fall down and had an injury in his back and head . This was the worst thing .. pls see into it and revert me back Email - amoghshukla8@gmail.com

Name: gauri151
Title: Loved my experience over there
Review: We had a party over there and even had a lot of fun the rooms over there . You will not be a to go in the horror one if there are no adult present in there with you

Name: prerna1232022
Title: Liked the adventure.
Review: It was an adventurous experience. A must visit place for the people who like adventure. Will visit again for rest of the remaining mysteriesüëçüëå

Name: bubblesbansal07
Title: A fun experience !!
Review: By far my favourite experience of escape rooms... They're so well done and detailed !! The rooms are challenging and fun, a must go to place to have fun with your friends or fam. Loved it <3 I'll surely try all of the rooms xD

Name: shagunagarwal12
Title: Over expensive
Review: Experience was good but it was overpriced .Not worth spending 4000 for a game with 5 friends. Although I played 2 games back to back so I enjoyed the game but yes it was overpriced.Price should be of a kind that everyone can enjoy the game .And I think it was just because of overprice i found d place completely vaccant.It was just 5 of us who played.Rest is companys choice

Name: MallikaDwivedi
Title: Fun adventure!
Review: My family and I had a wonderful time solving the clever puzzles and meticulously designed rooms. Theres a good variety to select from with varying difficulty levels, and i look forward to visiting again! Definitely recommend with family/friends

Name: sambhavisingh2008
Title: Best place to visit with your friends
Review: The games are very exciting once you play one you want to play all of them. Even the staff is very good. They are friendly and helpful. A must visit place.

Name: GodDevil_14
Title: Strange but interesting
Review: It was a good experience as far as the story and theme goes as well as the hints but the only issue that I face while solving the mystery was that the hints provided were not matching with the place where those hints were to be utilised. It was more like a guess game for the first room as most of the things were solved on the basis of instincts.

Name: Skelly2202
Title: Great place to have fun
Review: This is one of the most fun places in Lucknow, the experiences are very challenging and immersive. I hope they add more experiences in Lucknow

Name: Nida U
Title: ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC
Review: Excellent experience! Hyper realistic props and the thrill and excitement of everything was unmatched. We were so addicted to the fun we had that we visited it four times at a stretch! Highly recommend it.

Name: Bhavya1008
Title: About the place and service.
Review: Excellent place to visit with family, friends and even parents. Very good and healthy environment. I loved it.

Name: wahebaHusain
Title: A must visit
Review: It was a delightful experience..once you go in the mystery begins and it seem so realistic..so it is worth trying..I have tried one and I am looking forward to go for other levels as well

Name: srijansaxena11
Title: Must have experience
Review: It was a very nice experience. The puzzles and everything was interesting to solve. It wasn't easy but it was doable. It's a unique experience. Overall it was enjoyable.

Name: atul g
Title: Family visit to mystery room
Review: I visited mystery room on 5.4.2022 with my kids and wife. The place was deserted but staff was behaving as if they are very busy and over booked. The room was small, dark and lacked any adventure. I will not recommend it as it is a costly affair @800 rs per adult.

Name: spardhachess
Title: Excellent Puzzles
Review: Mind shuffling games. More such centres should be added in Lucknow. I have done all 5 themes and want to explore more.

Name: Srivastava921
Title: Excellent
Review: It was really a good experience. It was my first time and to be honest I was thrilled and i am sure i will try more rooms from next time. Thank you!

Name: khushibanker5
Title: Thrilled
Review: Was a full of thriller and suspense experience inside the lock roomMust visit with friends to have fun and enjoyment

Name: palak31agarwal
Title: over expensive
Review: 800 per person for an hour  .  we paid 8000 for 10 . the game was fun but still it was highly overpriced..

Name: varshitatandon0
Title: Amazing experience
Review: It was indeed an amazing experience and to escape the room was definitely nerve-wrecking. All in all a great experience but a little expensive.

Name: vickykaushik81
Title: Amazing real life experience
Review: You will get real life experience.. A unique way of enjoying and spend time. Must visit once because once you visited then second time you won't stop yourself to visit again..

Name: kohlipragya
Title: amazing experience
Review: initially we were sceptical of visiting this place but it was one of the most memorable experience, we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves

Name: Meander40032954841
Title: Family fun time
Review: It was nicely managed. The team was monitoring through out the one hour. The puzzles were interesting and required observation and deduction. All the members of the team enjoyed. Children enjoyed the most. Even our 1 yr old member got into the mood and enjoyed by trying to use keys to open the locks which were ample. We tried the The Hurt locker. Surely will be trying others soon.

Name: saurabhmh2021
Title: Mystery Room Lucknow
Review: A good innovative concept, however highly overpriced. Also the in-room safety was a concern as one of our group members fell in the deep pit, luckily was not injured seriously.We were smartly charged extra on account of some invisible taxes, not mentioned on the tickets, however upon raising the issue it was returned, Be cautious and pay only the amount mentioned on the tickets.

Name: Priyankameetugupta
Title: Scary games
Review: Wonderful experience amazing games.The whole setup and the entire activities was too good.you can more fun with family & friends

Name: ps2959
Title: Worth one time visit
Review: It's interesting and enjoyable for the first visit but they should include offers and better rewards and decrease the charge. Also share the pictures taken by them.

Name: ojaswanikumar
Title: staff was very rude and indifferent üòê and price is too high
Review: the mystery room good but the staff/cashier there was very rude and indifferent and kept downplaying us and when i was checking whether my locker is locked or not he gave us a snarky remark as if i as a customer am not even allowed check the locker WHICH CONSISTS MY STUFF overall a very annoying guy but the game master and the person that came afterwards was very nice and 800 rupees is too much gor only 1 hour experience

Name: Mishthy A
Title: Amazing Experience üí´
Review: It was overall an amazing experience and probably the first time I ever did this even though I didn't escape it was pretty cool to try. Although I would like you to improve one thing that the TV's in the room should like always show the clues, we were getting a bit confused while looking at the tv, otherwise everything was cool.

Name: kashishrizvi003311
Title: It was interesting
Review: It was damn good we visited it on my birthday which was on 30 September it was damn interesting and bit difficult

Name: kgehwal17
Title: Good experience
Review: The experience was good, however if the main person was a bit fun then the experience would be more great.

Name: Akshat9105
Title: Great experience
Review: Great and fun experience !!! Totally enjoyed it with friends . Would love to visit it once more for some other game , themes are so exciting.

Name: pl_321789
Title: Mysteryrooms@Lko
Review: The themes need to be rethinked and renamed in accordance to the experience being provided and not just to attract people. The staff need not be inherently rude and should be helpful and guiding. Also the time allotted and ticket pricing for mystery room should be synchronous to the level of the room. Waiting area for the room was good but ambience should be bettered.

Name: Vibhu24
Title: Our experience.
Review: Experience was good.We really enjoyed. The only thing we didn't like is the price, as it was highly expensive. Rupees 800 for one mystery and for 1 hour is quite a bit expensive. Except for the price we loved the mission.

Name: sonalsingh22350
Title: Wonderful Experience
Review: If you are looking forward to spend a fun and interesting weekend with your friends, visit this place. Mystery rooms offer you good variety of options to chose and test your skills on different levels.

Name: escanor389
Title: game chosen was abduction
Review: dont play abduction if you have epilepsy or are in any way affected by flickering of lights secondly the clues are not at all helpfull anyone opting for abduction my advice is its just a waste of your time and money go for jailbreak or that bomb diffuse or any other but not abduction as the clues are not at all relative in any way possible btw our same friend group has solved almost every game in their catalogue but abduction is a broken one from their end only

Name: rohanpathak2021
Title: Amazing place for fun and games
Review: We played Lockout , the experiance was amazing. The game was thrilling and required good strategy...

Name: SHRISTI V
Title: It was funnnnnn!!!!!!
Review: Our overall experience was good, though it was our first time. We did enjoy a lot and had fun together. Even the staff members were very friendly and polite. I just loved this place and especially the mystery room games that made us work together to sum up the clues and hints and move forward to next steps. The games were totally brainstorming fun activities that made us think about the situation and solve them together. Me and my best friends really had a great time together. And I suggest you all to just give this place some time so that you can experience the same too.‚úåüèª‚úåüèª

Name: vrantikashukla
Title: The cabin in the woods
Review: The experience was good but i just have one suggestion it‚Äôs good the way you people design the game but i guess you can make the game more interesting by creating more real life experience that is try to play with psychology of the players rather than the difficulty level of solving the codes it would be more exciting and more of fun

Name: amolkrishnapatel
Title: Mind Boggling!!
Review: Really fun place, Hangouts for friends or family. Well organized. Excellent themes. And great puzzles.

Name: Shreya_Bharti
Title: Bhangarh Fort Experience
Review: Bhangarh fort experience was a wonderful. I really want to visit again for solving the mysteries of rest of the rooms.

Name: lightkeeper69
Title: setup&puzzles
Review: I t  w a s   g o o d   o v e r a l l   . H a d   a g r e a t    t i m e   t h e r e ..  ...........................üíìüíì we'd be visiting again soonüíìüíì

Name: CookieZon
Title: A brilliant challenge
Review: When it comes to outings, there's nothing I've enjoyed more than mystery rooms. It was a wonderful bonding experience. Mystery rooms is a must visit place... Be it with family or with friends.

Name: shanumalhotra6
Title: Good experience
Review: Unique and an appealing concept. The very first experience and an awesome one. Seems you guys have made it up with all the unveiling imaginations.Keep up the good concept. #Hurray

Name: Kushagra P
Title: Will plan again to visit hereüòÅ
Review: Place was good. I will plan again to visit here. Must visit with group of friends and your 1 hr will be worthy.

Name: PUSHP N
Title: One of the best Mystery rooms , in our country.
Review: amazing ambience , decor. and everything was superb . ive been to many mystery rooms , but this one had a different look and more over , the cafe combined is just extra ordinary.

Name: Rachna
Title: Mastery at Mystery
Review: I went to the Mystery Rooms in Lucknow with a very dear friend. It was our first time at the game. it was truly a wonderful experience. Not for once did we feel bored. The excitement levels only went up with each passing second. A fun-filled experience for family and friends together. shall visit again.

Name: Daksh2801
Title: AMAZING CONCEPT
Review: This is super interesting for people who like challenges and want to keep their logical skills strong. This is a 'Must visit' place. I love the whole concept of Mystery room.

Name: Suryansh
Title: Masquerade food review session!
Review: Ever wanted to enjoy a real life escape experience along with some really good food and drinks?If yes then masquerade lucknow is the perfect place for you! Calling this place awesome would be undermining it! This place is the ultimate hangout place for you and your friends. Be it playstation, famous novels, scrumptious food, refreshing drinks, mystery rooms, this cafe got everything! ‚ù§Ô∏èComing to ambience ,this place has for sure, one of the most soothing and pleasant environment! You just feel at peace as soon as you enter the cafe! The comfy seatings, the vibes are just perfect!Starting with food, black hot dog, mystery pops and black pizza are a must try! You'll just love the taste, the texture everything! Their kitchens are the one of the most hygienic kitchens I have ever seen. Service is prompt and every person working there attends to each and every customer properly! Now the drinks and shakes, I must say their brownie and red velvet shakes will definitely win your hearts! Their presentation is just top-notch - 10/10. Their mocktails are also really good and quite refreshing. So overall, you will love this place and you can't stop yourself from coming again and again. This is by far one of the most perfect cafes in Lucknow!‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: muskanmittal2349
Title: Appreciable
Review: I really enjoyed...the 1st time experience was vry good...does not matters we win or loose...the most important part is to take part and experience...it was worth going there.

Name: Pooja A
Title: Superb
Review: Awesome game great ambience well c ordinated activities and very friendly staff. L loved being there. Will visit again

Name: shammychanchal786
Title: Bhangarh
Review: It is full entertaining game. They allow 60mins but I just took 54 mins to solve the mystery into the game. Amazing amazing amazing game ever.

Name: ENVIRONMENT A
Title: Complete fun in an hour
Review: Great experience...friendly staff ... value for money...really good to spend time without electronic gadgets

Name: Yesh M
Title: Intellect fun
Review: Hardly we find a Place where we can have a group activity applying our common sense. It was reallt fun, would visit again for more levels.

Name: Varsha S
Title: Amazing, thrilling experience. Does not disappoint.
Review: The entire experience is thrilling, unique and new. You will definitely enjoy your time and still be wanting more. Go For It !!!!

Name: Prakarsh_Sinha
Title: Pretty great!
Review: Looking forward to sherlocking the other mysteries. And the medals really burnished the credibility in our team work.

Name: Meander55139161299
Title: Place Has my heart
Review: This place has my heart. Mystery rooms is a unique concept in lko where u r locked in a theme based room with your team and all u have to do is solve the mysteries to get out of there before the time kicks u out.

Name: akashyadav12
Title: It‚Äôs an amazing place. Time flies away so fast that you won‚Äôt even realise. I loved the experience.
Review: The rooms are full of hints but you won‚Äôt even capture them. One hour of suspense and the happiness on escaping the mystery room is all worth it.
